00030 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_MUTEX_H_
00031 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_LUBYK_MUTEX_H_
00032 #include <pthread.h>
00033 #include <assert.h>
00034 #include <cstdio>
00035 #include <string.h> // strerror
00036 
00037 #include "lubyk/non_copyable.h"
00038 
00039 namespace lubyk {
00040 
00043 class Mutex : private NonCopyable
00044 {
00045   pthread_mutex_t mutex_;
00046   friend class Condition;
00047 public:
00048   Mutex() {
00049     int status = pthread_mutex_init(&mutex_, NULL);
00050     if (status != 0) {
00051       fprintf(stderr, "Could not initialize mutex (%s)\n", strerror(status));
00052     }
00053   }
00054 
00055   // FIXME: remove virtual and sub-classes (Thread, ZeroConf..)
00056   virtual ~Mutex() {
00057     int status = pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex_);
00058     if (status != 0) {
00059       fprintf(stderr, "Could not destroy mutex (%s)\n", strerror(status));
00060       assert(false);
00061     }
00062   }
00063 
00067   inline void lock() {
00068     pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex_);
00069   }
00070 
00072   inline void unlock() {
00073     pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex_);
00074   }
00075 };
00076 
00077 
00080 class ScopedSLock : private NonCopyable {
00081 public:
00082   ScopedSLock(Mutex *mutex) : mutex_ptr_(mutex) {
00083     mutex_ptr_->lock();
00084   }
00085 
00086   ScopedSLock(Mutex &mutex) : mutex_ptr_(&mutex) {
00087     mutex_ptr_->lock();
00088   }
00089 
00090   ~ScopedSLock() {
00091     mutex_ptr_->unlock();
00092   }
00093  private:
00094   Mutex *mutex_ptr_;
00095 };

00100 class ScopedSUnlock : private NonCopyable
00101 {
00102   Mutex *mutex_ptr_;
00103 
00104 public:
00105   ScopedSUnlock(Mutex *mutex) : mutex_ptr_(mutex) {
00106     mutex_ptr_->unlock();
00107   }
00108 
00109   ScopedSUnlock(Mutex &mutex) : mutex_ptr_(&mutex) {
00110     mutex_ptr_->unlock();
00111   }
00112 
00113   ~ScopedSUnlock() {
